name: Last Sea's Moon
description:
You are shipwrecked on a ship watching its end. But, not alone...

"Last Sea's Moon" is a game for the InspireJam (February 2022). I choose as main inspirations "Bloodborne" by FromSoftware and "The Island of the Day Before" by Umberto Eco. From both I picked characters, themes, and the overall mood of this game.
